Question Text: Would you want this future or not? Please explain why.
Response Text: I'm not sure if this is the ideal future vision; while improvements in reducing caregiver stress are mentioned, human autonomy is also lost, and that's a very important dilemma to consider. I've always thought that technology, AI, etc., should support but not completely replace human reasoning, as they lack feelings. And humans would also lose the right to call themselves human if everything is left to AI.

Question Text: Would you want this future or not? Please explain why.
Response Text:
Yes, I would. Seeing ads about things I absolutely would never want is pointless. And having an assistant doing the comparisons for me would be fantastic, because it's a time consuming process, and I want to spend time on meaningful things.

Of course, there would be AI influencers which would target me, but I trust there would be AI influencer blockers as well. Schools teaching mental defense classes in order to help spot manipulation is just not a bad thing so I don't see any downside.
